name: Benny's Burgers
description: Benny's Burgers was a diner in Hawkins, Indiana. Located at 4819 Randolph Lane, the diner was family owned and operated by the Hammonds since 1956.

name: Bradley's Big Buy
description: Bradley's Big Buy is a supermarket located in Hawkins.

name: Byers House (Hawkins)
description: The former residence of the Byers family and Eleven was located in Hawkins, Indiana. The house was somewhat run down and in worse-for-wear condition.

name: Brimborn Steel Works
description: The Brimborn Steel Works was an abandoned steel mill located in Hawkins, Indiana.

name: Lover's Lake
description: Lover's Lake was a lake in Hawkins, Indiana.

name: Castle Byers
description: Castle Byers was a makeshift fort made by Will and Jonathan Byers in the forest near the Byers house.

name: Curse gates
description: The curse gates were four specific gates opened by Vecna in March 1986. Through his "curse" power, Vecna began tormenting and killing various Hawkins residents

name: Creel House
description: The Creel House was the Creel family's short-lived residence in Hawkins, Indiana.

name: Mayfield trailer
description: The Mayfield trailer is a trailer home that Max Mayfield and her mother lived in after Max's stepfather.

name: Melvald's General Store
description: Melvald's General Store was run by Donald Melvald and employed Joyce Byers and Jeffrey.

name: Munson trailer
description: The Munson trailer was a trailer home where Eddie Munson lived with his uncle Wayne.

name: Murray's warehouse
description: A warehouse located at 3833 Walker Drive in Sesser, Illinois was the residence of Murray Bauman.

name: Palace Arcade
description: The Palace was a local arcade in Hawkins. It featured a variety of games, including Dragon's Lair and Dig Dug

name: Pennhurst Mental Hospital
description: Pennhurst Mental Hospital was a hospital located in Kerley County, Indiana. It housed patients with a wide variety of mental illnesses, including the supposed murderer, Victor Creel.

name: Rink-O-Mania
description: The Rink-O-Mania is a roller-skating rink located in Lenora Hills, California. It is implied that the Rink-O-Mania is a popular spot in the town, with even work parties being thrown there.

name: Rainbow Room
description: The "Rainbow Room" was a playroom Dr. Brenner set up for the psychokinetic child test subjects of Hawkins National Laboratory.

name: Fun Fair
description: The Fun Fair, also referred to as Roane County Fair, was an event held on 4 July, 1985 in Hawkins, Indiana in celebration of America's Independence Day.

name: Family Video
description: "Family Video Movie Club Inc." was an American video rental chain serving the United States and Canada.

name: Harrington House
description: The Harrington family had a residence in Hawkins, Indiana.

name: Hawk Theater
description: The Hawk was a movie theater located in downtown Hawkins, in the town square.

name: Roane Hill Cemetery
description: Roane Hill Cemetery is a cemetery located in Roane County, Indiana.

name: The Nina Project
description: "The Nina Project" was the codename of a top secret government facility and program located in the Nevada desert, conceived and developed by former Hawkins Lab directors Dr. Martin Brenner and Dr. Sam Owens.

name: Hopper's trailer
description: A lakeside trailer in Hawkins, Indiana was the residence of local police chief Jim Hopper.

name: Hopper's cabin
description: Hopper's cabin is the residence of Jim Hopper and Eleven in Hawkins, Indiana.

name: Henderson House
description: The Henderson House is the residence of Dustin and Claudia Henderson, Yurtle and Tews, and until 1984, Mews.

name: Vecna's Mind Lair
description: Vecna's Mindscape, or the Mind Lair, is a visual representation of Vecna's mind, a psychic terrain consciously created by Vecna sometime between 1979 and 1986.

name: The Void
description: The Void is a visual representation of a psychokinetic test subject's mind when immersed in a highly particular psychic state.

name: Wheeler House
description: The residence of the Wheeler family was in Hawkins, Indiana.

name: The Upside Down
description: The Upside Down was a name given to describe a mysterious alternate dimension existing in parallel to the human world.

name: Starcourt Mall
description: Starcourt Mall was a shopping center located at 10 Old Highway 77, Hawkins, Indiana.

name: Hawkins High School
description: Hawkins High School is the high school in the town of Hawkins.

name: Hawkins National Laboratory
description: Hawkins National Laboratory was a secretive federal complex located in Hawkins, Indiana

name: Hamburgueria do Benny
description: A Hamburgueria do Benny era uma lanchonete em Hawkins, Indiana. Localizada em 4819 Randolph Lane, a lanchonete era de propriedade familiar e operada pelos Hammonds desde 1956.

name: Bradley's Big Buy
description: Bradley's Big Buy é um supermercado localizado em Hawkins.

name: Casa dos Byers (Hawkins)
description: A antiga residência da família Byers e Eleven estava localizada em Hawkins, Indiana. A casa estava um tanto degradada e em péssimo estado de conservação.

name: Brimborn Steel Works
description: A Brimborn Steel Works era uma siderúrgica abandonada localizada em Hawkins, Indiana.

name: Lago dos amantes
description: Lover's Lake era um lago em Hawkins, Indiana.

name: Castelo dos Byers
description: Castelo dos Byers era um forte improvisado feito por Will e Jonathan Byers na floresta perto da casa de Byers.

name: Portões amaldiçoados
description: Os portões da maldição eram quatro portões específicos abertos por Vecna em março de 1986. Através de seu poder de "maldição", Vecna começou a atormentar e matar vários residentes de Hawkins.

name: Casa dos Creel
description: A Casa dos Creel foi a residência de curta duração da família Creel em Hawkins, Indiana.

name: Trailer de Mayfield
description: O trailer de Mayfield é um trailer em que Max Mayfield e sua mãe viveram depois do padrasto de Max.

name: Loja geral de Melvald
description: A Loja geral de Melvald era administrado por Donald Melvald e empregava Joyce Byers e Jeffrey.

name: Trailer de Munson
description: O trailer de Munson era um trailer onde Eddie Munson morava com seu tio Wayne.

name: Armazém do Murray
description: Um armazém localizado na 3833 Walker Drive em Sesser, Illinois, era a residência de Murray Bauman.

name: Palace Arcade
description: O Palace era um fliperama local em Hawkins. Apresentava uma variedade de jogos, incluindo Dragon's Lair e Dig Dug

name: Hospital Psiquiátrico de Pennhurst
description: Hospital Psiquiátrico de Pennhurst era um hospital localizado no Condado de Kerley, Indiana. Abrigava pacientes com uma grande variedade de doenças mentais, incluindo o suposto assassino, Victor Creel.

name: Rink-O-Mania
description: O Rink-O-Mania é um rinque de patinação localizado em Lenora Hills, Califórnia. Está implícito que o Rink-O-Mania é um local popular na cidade, com até grupos de trabalho sendo organizados lá.

name: O quarto arco-íris
description: A "Sala Arco-Íris" era uma sala de jogos que o Dr. Brenner montou para as cobaias infantis psicocinéticas do Laboratório Nacional Hawkins.

name: Feira de diversões
description: A Feira de diversões, também conhecida como Feira do Condado de Roane, foi um evento realizado em 4 de julho de 1985 em Hawkins, Indiana, em comemoração ao Dia da Independência dos Estados Unidos.

name: Family Video
description: "Family Video Movie Club Inc." foi uma rede de locadoras de vídeo americana que atende os Estados Unidos e o Canadá.

name: Casa dos Harrington
description: A família Harrington tinha uma residência em Hawkins, Indiana.

name: Teatro Hawk
description: O Hawk era um cinema localizado no centro de Hawkins, na praça da cidade.

name: Cemitério de Roane Hill
description: O Cemitério de Roane Hill é um cemitério localizado no Condado de Roane, Indiana.

name: O Projeto Nina
description: "O Projeto Nina" era o codinome de uma instalação e programa secreto do governo localizado no deserto de Nevada, concebido e desenvolvido pelos ex-diretores do Hawkins Lab, Dr. Martin Brenner e Dr. Sam Owens.

name: Trailer de Hopper
description: Um trailer à beira do lago em Hawkins, Indiana, era a residência do chefe de polícia local Jim Hopper.

name: Cabana do Hopper
description: A cabana de Hopper é a residência de Jim Hopper e Eleven em Hawkins, Indiana.

name: Casa dos Henderson
description: A Casa dos Henderson é a residência de Dustin e Claudia Henderson, Yurtle e Tews, e até 1984, Mews.

name: Covil da Mente do Vecna
description: A Mente do Vecna, ou Covil da Mente, é uma representação visual da mente de Vecna, um terreno psíquico conscientemente criado por Vecna em algum momento entre 1979 e 1986.

name: O Vazio
description: O Vazio é uma representação visual da mente de um sujeito de teste psicocinético quando imerso em um estado psíquico altamente particular.

name: Casa dos Wheeler
description: A residência da família Wheeler era em Hawkins, Indiana.

name: O Mundo Invertido
description: O Mundo Invertido foi um nome dado para descrever uma misteriosa dimensão alternativa existente em paralelo com o mundo humano.

name: O Shopping Starcount
description: O Starcourt Mall era um shopping center localizado na 10 Old Highway 77, Hawkins, Indiana.

name: Escola de ensino médio de Hawkins
description: A Escola de ensino médio de Hawkins

name: Laboratório Nacional de Hawkins
description: O Laboratório Nacional de Hawkins era um complexo federal secreto localizado em Hawkins, Indiana
